Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Western (O'Hare Branch). Service resuming, allow extra time

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier mechanical problem at Western (O'Hare Branch).

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
